title: Question about Inquisitor Nautilus(Rioters pls)
body:
Hey Community,hey Riot.

I just wanted to ask if the price of Inquisitor nautilus is already Set 100%
Because i and probaly many others think, that the price should be upped so we can finnaly get another skin with diffrent particles.

Please a honest answer

replies.body:
Hey there! 

He's definitely 750 RP. 

As Keagn said, he did get a couple 'quality of life' particles.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=dtkpAy0R,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-04T21:52:08.513+0000)
>
> Hey there! 
> 
> He's definitely 750 RP. 
> 
> As Keagn said, he did get a couple 'quality of life' particles.

Oh my gosh. I'm valid.

The climb has begun.

Hey!

I think its safe to say that Inquisitor Nautilus's price is set in stone at 750 RP at least, but he did get fairly good treatment! Titan's Wrath has new particles/effects, like shields and a green glow instead of his red eyes.
